alert.note: Alert for Inland Matagorda (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 03 at 11:38AM CST until February 04 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills from the teens to 20s above zero. * WHERE...Inland Matagorda County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For more information from the National Weather Service visit https://weather.gov/houston For the latest road conditions for Texas visit https://drivetexas.org
